review.title: “Could use a little more organization in the fiance department .”
review.pros: Pros – They get a decent amount of jobs. They've around for a long time. Good customer service and follow up on getting the talent on set.
review.cons: Cons – Majority of jobs are are non union jobs that don't really pay that well. It takes up to 90 days to get paid.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Come up with a better way to get the talent paid sooner cause the current system turns them off.
